actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the Sewall-Belmont House National Historic Site, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the establishment in the District of Columbia of the Sewall-Belmont House National Historic Site. Authorizes appropriations to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Sewall-Belmont House National Historic Site, and for other purposes.
